prompt:
Clean minimal tech infographic. Title 'CENTAUR BRAIN' at top in bold dark gray.

Center: happy smiling pink octopus mascot in white circle, labeled 'Pulpito' below. The octopus should look friendly and confident, not worried.

Five pastel rounded rectangles connected to center with thin gray lines:

TOP LEFT - cyan gradient box labeled 'INPUTS': Signal, WhatsApp, CLI, cron heartbeats (with small icons)

TOP CENTER - coral/peach gradient box labeled 'MEMORY': HEARTBEAT.md, research-vault, AGENTS.md, Profundo (with document icons)

TOP RIGHT - mint green gradient box labeled 'SYNC': Git, GitHub, launchd, SSH (with small icons)

BOTTOM LEFT - lavender gradient box labeled 'TOOLS': shell commands, MCP servers (with terminal icons)

BOTTOM RIGHT - teal gradient box labeled 'OUTPUTS': messages, code commits, file writes, notifications (with small icons)

BOTTOM CENTER - light blue box showing 'NODES': MacBook (OndaLaptop), Linux server (Poza) with laptop and server icons

Style: Modern SaaS infographic, soft shadows, off-white background, clean sans-serif font, highly readable text, no typos.
